prompt: Create a clean and modern privacy policy page with a white background. Display a prominent title 'Privacy Policy' at the top using large, bold dark text. Below the title, include a brief introductory paragraph explaining the purpose of the policy in medium gray text. Add multiple content sections with bold subheadings like 'Data Collection', 'Data Usage', 'Data Storage', and 'Contact Information'. Each section should contain descriptive paragraph text in dark gray color. At the bottom, include two action buttons - an 'Accept' button with blue background and white text, and a 'Decline' button with transparent background and blue border. The entire layout should be vertically scrollable with proper padding and spacing between elements.
